sentences.sentence: She is the most vocal and pertinacious of all the critics of the policy.
sentences.translation: 在所有的政策批评家中，她是陈词最多而且最为固执的。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the etiology of pertinacious chronic cough in children.

sentences.sentence: His style of argument in meetings is not so much aggressive as pertinacious .
sentences.translation: 他在会上的辩论风格应该说是坚持己见，而不能说是咄咄逼人。
